TEXT.TITLE: ALGERIA TENDERING FOR BALANCE EEP WHEAT - TRADE
TEXT.BODY: Algeria is tendering tonight for 225,000 tonnes of hard red winter wheat at 94.00 dlrs per tonne, c and f, the balance of its original tender under the export bonus program, U.S. exporters said. Algeria bought 75,000 tonnes for November and early December shipmet at that bid, but USDA rejected the bid on wheat for later shipments, the sources said. Reuter
